title: Cinefantastique Vol 07 No 2 (Summer 1978)
creator: Cinefantastique
description: Cover story and interview with composer Hans J. Salter, who scored many of the Universal horror films. Also includes an on-set production diary from Brian DePalma's The Fury , interviews with Dan O'Bannon ( Alien ), Paul Schrader ( Close Encounters of the Third Kind ), David Allen ( The Primevals ), Hoyt Yeatman ( Canned Performance ), and more.
